text: Christian Marquis (born 20 October 1953) is a French rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Christian Marquis
